text: 14:3 Kolosi 2:16Gumazir biziba bar da apim, gumazir asɨziba apir puvatɨzim gɨrakɨrangɨn adarir nɨghnɨzibar a damuan markɨ. Eghtɨ uaghan gumazir asɨziba apir puvatɨzim, a fo, God a inizɨ a siosɨn aven ize, kamaghɨn, a gumazir biziba bar ada apimɨn arazibar gan da tuisɨghan markɨ egh suam, an araziba ikufi.
